admin.allRecordImported: All data has been imported successfully.

basisOfRecord.description: Type of record according to the nature of the specimen
basisOfRecord.restrictions: May only take the values FOSSIL | NON_FOSSIL

catalogNumber.description: Unique identifier within the institution and collection
catalogNumber.restrictions: Must be unique within an institution and collection

collectionCode.description: Indicates the collection to which the occurrence belongs

countryCode.description: Country where the occurrence was recorded

admin.csvFileExpected: A data file in .csv format is expected
admin.csvSpecification: You must follow the following specification to upload a CSV:
admin.firstRow: The first row contains the names of the following fields:

institutionCode.description: Code of the institution hosting the collection
institutionCode.restrictions: May only take the values IMEDEA | MCNB | MVHN | UB | IBB

admin.moreInformation: For more information on the meaning of each field, refer to the Darwin Core term list at:
admin.partialRecordsImported: Data has been partially imported. Upon accepting, a file will be downloaded with the discarded data and the reason for rejection.
admin.publishingFailed: Although the data has been added to the database, an error occurred during the publishing process and it will not be visible. Contact the system administrator to investigate the cause.

taxonID.description: Numeric taxonomic identifier according to GBIF
taxonID.restrictions: Must correspond to a valid GBIF identifier

admin.uniqueIdentificator: They act jointly as a universal unique identifier; therefore, they cannot be duplicated within the same CSV, and if that combination already exists in the database, the record will be replaced.
admin.uploadError: When uploading a CSV, if any record does not meet the criteria, it will not be validated. You will be able to download a CSV file containing the rejected records and the reason for rejection.

scientific_journals.title: Scientific journals
scientific_journals.works: Works of the Geology Museum of Barcelona
